Accept.title: Accept
Accept.description: Specify the types of resources that will be accepted by the client.

accountParams.title: Accounts
accountParams.description: Configure how your application accounts will be imported

accountThresholdValue.title: Account Threshold
accountThresholdValue.description: Set the maximum number of accounts that can be suspended or deleted (if the value is exceeded, no action is taken).

acctEntMappings.title: Entitlement Mappings
acctEntMappings.description: Map entitlements from your application to Saviynt if there aren't separate API calls.

acctEntParams.title: Account Entitlements
acctEntParams.description: Configure how your account entitlements will be imported

acctIdPath.title: Account ID Path
acctIdPath.description: Define the path of the account ID in the response JSON.

acctKeyField.title: Account Key Field
acctKeyField.description: Define the key field that uniquely identifies your account.

activeStatus.title: Active Status
activeStatus.description: Specify the values that will identify active accounts in the target application.

Authorization.title: Authorization
Authorization.description: Specify the authorization mechanism that will be used when making API calls to your application.

call.title: Data Calls
call.description: Enter the values that will allow data to be retrieved from your application via API calls.

callOrder.title: Call Order
callOrder.description: Specify the order of API calls, starting with zero (the lowest value is called first).

colsToPropsMap.title: Attribute Mapping
colsToPropsMap.description: Map the properties between the target application and Saviynt

connection.title: Connection Name
connection.description: Specify the name of the connection

correlateInactiveAccounts.title: Inactive Accounts
correlateInactiveAccounts.description: Indicate whether or not you want to correlate inactive accounts to users (enter true or false).

deleteAccEntForActiveAccounts.title: Delete Active Account Entitlements
deleteAccEntForActiveAccounts.description: Indicate whether or not you want account entitlements deleted for active accounts (enter true or false).

deleteLinks.title: Delete Links
deleteLinks.description: Indicate whether or not you want accounts that have been deleted in your application to also be deleted in Saviynt (enter true or false).

disableDeletedEntitlements.title: Disable Deleted Entitlements
disableDeletedEntitlements.description: No longer required in the current codebase (set to false).

entitlementParams.title: Entitlements
entitlementParams.description: Configure how your entitlements will be imported

entKeyField.title: Entitlement Key Field
entKeyField.description: Define the key field that uniquely identifies your entitlements.

entTypeOrder.title: Entitlement Type Order
entTypeOrder.description: Specify the order of entitlement types, starting with zero.

entTypes.title: Entitlement Types
entTypes.description: Specify all the types of entitlements to be imported.

Group.title: Group
Group.description: Configure the API call for the group entitlement type.

http.title: API Calls
http.description: Specify the details required to make API calls.

httpHeaders.title: HTTP Headers
httpHeaders.description: Specify the header parameters that will be sent with API calls.

httpContentType.title: HTTP Content Type
httpContentType.description: Specify the content type parameters for API calls (JSON, text, html, XML or application XML).

httpMethod.title: HTTP Method
httpMethod.description: Specify the method that will be used to call the API (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE and GETWITHBODY).

idPath.title: ID Path
idPath.description: Specify the JSON key in API responses that will hold unique values and get mapped to the Key Field.

inactivateAccountsNotInFile.title: Inactivate Accounts
inactivateAccountsNotInFile.description: Indicate whether or not you want accounts that have been deleted in your application to be marked as inactive (enter true or false).

keyField.title: Key Field
keyField.description: Specify the account ID that Saviynt will use to identify if the incoming request is for a new or current account.

listField.title: List Field
listField.description: Specify the path to the list of accounts that will be used in API responses.

listPath.title: List Path
listPath.description: Specify the JSON key to the list of entitlements in API responses (ignore if entitlements are not available as an array).

nextUrl.title: Next URL
nextUrl.description: Configure the pagination type that will be used to obtain paged results.

nextUrlPath.title: Next URL Path
nextUrlPath.description: Specify the condition that will be used to check for the next page of accounts (if no path is found with the URL, it stops).

pagination.title: Pagination
pagination.description: Indicate whether or not paged results will be allowed in call responses.

processingType.title: Processing Type
processingType.description: Specify that the data to be imported will be sequential and iterative.

Role.title: Role
Role.description: Configure the API call for the role entitlement type.

stageNumber.title: Stage Number
stageNumber.description: Specify the stage number for API calls (enter zero for the first API call).

statusAndThresholdConfig.title: Status & Threshold
statusAndThresholdConfig.description: Specify the parameters that will be used to make required changes and set limits during data imports.

statusColumn.title: Status Column
statusColumn.description: Specify the name of the column where the status of the imported account is stored.

url.title: URL
url.description: Specify the URL that will be used for API calls.
